This chair, holding a woman, is carried by two bearers, one in the left middle ground and the other in the right middle ground. Wooden buildings frame the scene on the left and right, stretching from the middle ground to the background, with hills in the distant background and an overcast sky at the top. The street extends from the foreground to the background. The camera, maintaining a full shot and positioned at the subject's level, then tracks the man as he lands in the center foreground and runs forward along the center of the street, moving towards the middle ground. As he advances, the sedan chair and bearers shift to the background. Other people, including three individuals in traditional attire, enter from the background and move into the middle ground, following him from the right and center of the street.
